description: Styles for the Tic Tac Toe web application, including theme management and layout design.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with styling for text alignment and background color.

classes.name: header
classes.description: Header styling with background color and padding.

classes.name: game-title
classes.description: Styling for the game title displaying the name of the game.

classes.name: status
classes.description: Styling for displaying the game status.

classes.name: board
classes.description: Grid layout for the game board.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styling for each square on the game board.

classes.name: restart-button
classes.description: Styling for the button to restart the game.

classes.name: winning-line
classes.description: Styling for the line indicating a winning condition.
